Created by Jack Mueller on 2/25/15.
AbstractTerritoryView() - Constructor for class com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.AbstractTerritoryView
 
apply(ViewGroup) - Method in class com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.AbstractBoardView
Puts programmatically generated views into the supplied viewPort based on the AbstractBoardView.territoryViewMap and any other Views that are defined by the subclass implementation.
apply(ViewGroup) - Method in class com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.GridTextBoardView
TerritoryViews are represented by Buttons and other defined Views include a one column GridLayout as the ViewPort implementation, LinearLayouts for the rows of the grid, and Android Space objects to simulate columns.
